programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E10, Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E26, In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E15, Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

MST3K: The Robot vs. The Aztec Mummy, 19891118000000 +0000, Scientists search for the ancient breastplate of a mummy, culminating in a mad scientist's attempt to fight the creature through the construction of a robot.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: King Dinosaur
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: King Dinosaur, S02E10, In King Dinosaur, the crew pokes fun as scientists are terrorized by snakes, bugs, and dinosaurs on a newly discovered planet.

programme.title: The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews, S04E07, An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E20, The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

MST3K: Radar Secret Service, 19931218000000 +0000, Mike and the bots learn the art of safe driving and why you should pay attention at railroad crossings in the 1959 short, Last Clear Chance. Later, they watch government agents use radar technology to catch criminals in Radar Secret Service.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E21, Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: Cave Dwellers
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Cave Dwellers, S03E01, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.

programme.title: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Overdrawn At The Memory Bank, S09E22, A weather tech's mind gets trapped in a computer and Pearl establishes her own public television pledge program.

programme.title: What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E108, Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.
MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler, 19931107000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).

programme.title: These Games
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth is feeling caught between overprotective Jack and new miner Billy.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail is encouraged to re-open Coal Valley's dilapidated and abandoned cafe.

programme.title: Perils of the Soloists
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Abigail emotionally move out of the row house.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

While You Were Dating, 20170212000000 +0000, A divorced couple meet online and end up going on a blind date together. After an awkward reunion, they decide to set each other up with their friends, but old habits never quite die. Stars Billy Baldwin and Stefanie VonPfetten.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

The Memory Book, 20140726000000 +0000, At a flea market, Chloe discovers a book of photos showcasing the romance of a young couple from the early seventies. She sets out on a literal and emotional journey to find the happy couple she knows only through photos.

The Music Teacher, 20120811000000 +0000, When music teacher Alyson Daley loses her after-school music program to budget cuts, her former students get together to put on a fund-raiser recreating a musical they performed years before.

When Sparks Fly, 20140628000000 +0000, Fireworks go off when Amy Peterson comes home to help save her family's annual 4th of July celebration and discovers she loves the man she left behind years ago to pursue her dreams of becoming a journalist. Stars Meghan Markle.

The Mystery Cruise, 20131005000000 +0000, Alvirah, Regan, and their husbands join a murder mystery cruise. But, when Alvirah sees a real murder attempt, she and Regan must find a way to keep the intended victim safe while trying to find proof to expose the murderer.

programme.title: Past And Present
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E11, SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E16, The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search the team begin to worry about their new allies, and their motives

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E18, Plagued by terrifying nightmares, Teyla (Rachel Luttrell) begins to recall a time when she and her father were captured by the Wraith and subjected to disturbing experiments. With the help of an old Athosian woman, Teyla looks deep into her past.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E19, With a group of Wraith hive ships on the way to Atlantis, the team searches for a place to flee and a way to destroy the city. McKay (David Hewlett) leads a team to try and activate the Ancients' orbital weapons platform to destroy the Wraith.

programme.title: The Siege (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E20, Just as the team is beginning to lose hope, Col. Everett is sent from the Stargate Program on Earth. As Everett and the team strategize, a new battleship, the Daedalus, arrives with a new Zero Point Module, bringing with it new hope.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E13, During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Foothold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E14, During routine medical exams, Dr. Fraiser injects each team member with a sedative. Teal'c awakens and sees General Hammond conspiring with Fraiser and two aliens. What has happened at Stargate Command, and can SG-1 overpower its own allies?

programme.title: Pretense
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E15, When SG-1 is invited to planet Tollan to attend a Triad ceremony, they are shocked to discover it is actually a trial to determine the fate of their friend Skaara. Daniel and O'Neill must argue a case against a mysterious Goa'uld to save Skaara.

programme.title: Heartbreaker
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E018, David has his first session with a psychologist and Andrea realizes her pregnancy will affect her educational plans.

programme.title: The Labors of Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E019, Andrea decides to have an abortion and Nat has surgery.

programme.title: Scared Very Straight
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E020, Jesse and Andrea set a wedding date and Donna asks David to the Valentine dance.

programme.title: Addicted to Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E021, Brenda and Stuart get stranded in the desert. Kelly helps Brandon avoid suspicion by posing as his girlfriend.

programme.title: Change Partners
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E022, Brandon and Kelly go on a weekend retreat, while Dylan and Lucinda spend time together. Brenda and Donna take in a stray dog.

programme.title: A Pig Is a Boy Is a Dog
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E023, Donna is heartbroken when Rocky dies. Brandon and Lucinda break up and Kelly tells Dylan about her moment with Brandon.

programme.title: Cuffs and Links
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E024, Brenda is arrested for breaking and entering into the college medical lab. Afterward, her friends avoid her to avoid being seen as accessories.

programme.title: The Time Has Come Today
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E025, Brenda finds an old diary and spends spring break in a different era, while the rest of the gang goes to Palm Springs.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E026, Brandon and Steve have car trouble and the girls organize a fundraiser involving a pin-up calendar.

programme.title: Divas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E027, Brenda auditions for the leading role in the school play and Brandon receives some unwanted attention.

programme.title: Acting Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E028, Kelly and Brenda fight over the lead role in the school play. Andrea is rushed to the hospital.

programme.title: Truth Or Consequences
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E029, Vicious rumors spread when Brenda gets the lead role in the school play. Steve and Brenda prevent a suicide.

programme.title: Vital Signs
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E030, Brandon fears he will lose his chance to go to Washington. Kelly and Dylan break up. Andrea goes into labor.

programme.title: Mr. Walsh Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S04E031, Brandon goes to Washington D.C. and Kelly decides to surprise him by showing up later. Donna worries about David spending time with another girl.

programme.title: What I Did On My Summer Vacation and Other Stories
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E001, After enjoying a successful summer in London, Brenda decides to stay in England and pursue her stage career.

programme.title: Whitney’s Bus/Stop, Drop & Roll
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E226, A 5-year-old is hit by a school bus. A model volcano suddenly explodes engulfing a youngster in flames.

programme.title: Asthma/Double Football Player
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E193, A man suffers a severe asthma attack. The tragic story of football star Jerry Anderson is told.

programme.title: Amtrak/Dog
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E209, A High-Speed train collision requires an emergency response. A special canine tracking unit is called in to find an 8-year-old.

programme.title: Remarriage/Cop Saves Dog
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E142, A 15-year-old flips off of his bike and is found unconscious / A Dalmatian swallows a squash ball and becomes unconscious

programme.title: Fire Sister/Surfboard
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E329, A family's daughter is trapped inside their burning home. A Florida boy is injured after diving into a lake.

programme.title: Police Dog Down/Asphalt Trap
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E342, A police dog is caught in the line of fire during a search mission. An asphalt truck over turns trapping the occupants inside.

programme.title: Helicopter Horse/Kids in Smoke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E251, A horse loses its footing and throws a rider off 300 feet down onto a ledge. A 12-year-old babysitter notices black smoke.

programme.title: RN Rough River/Bar Blast, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E206, While white water rafting, six fiends are capsized. Three are swept downstream. After a fight in a bar leaves innocent customers dead by gunfire, police begin a chase.

programme.title: Boxcar Boy/Dog Leash Struggle
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E343, Friends are playing on top of a boxcar when the train suddenly lurches forward. A 4-year old girl's life is threatened while playing with her dog.

programme.title: Baby Fire/Sealant Overdose
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E244, Woman babysitting 8 infants in her apartment realizes it's on fire. She must save the infants. A teenager inhales large quantities of toxic substances.

programme.title: MOTHER'S DAY FLOOD/ROLLERBLADE
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E323, Two women are trapped by a roaring flash flood. A boy rollerblading is hit by a truck.

programme.title: Underage Teen/Cardiac Controller
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E328, A 12-year-old girl is injured when she takes a car for a ride. A Seattle air traffic controller is found unconscious.

programme.title: Car Stripper/Hugo, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E266, William Shatner hosts re-enactments of real rescues.

programme.title: Mountain Glacier/Gas Thief
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E173, A man falls 1,000 while climbing down a Glacier. The officer is shot in the chest by escaping the suspect.

programme.title: Mother Shooting/Conrail Train
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E247, A woman is awoken by her husband, who is standing bedside aiming a .22 caliber rifle at her face. Two young children are playing on the railroad tracks oblivious to a freight train bearing down on them.

programme.title: Air Five/Rollercoaster
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E268, Rescue 911 cameras follow Los Angeles County's elite "Air Five" rescue unit. A boy is caught on the edge of a roller coaster car, loses his balance, and is dragged 75 feet.

programme.title: No Helmet/Riding Mower
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E249, An 8-year-old bicyclist, not wearing a protective helmet, is hit by an oncoming car. A young child slips on wet grass and was caught in the sharp blades of a lawnmower.

programme.title: Shaft Toddler/Police Quagmire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E277, A twenty-two-month-old falls into a 12-feet deep hole. Baltimore police get stuck in a swap after chasing auto-theft suspects.

programme.title: Miami Medchopper/River Raft

programme.title: Soul Survivor
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E01, Sean clashes with Jenna. A new love triangle emerges between new recruit Zack and rookie hopeful Carrie, who’s more interested in Jason. Sean and new lifeguard Leigh Dwyer confront daredevil Cliff, whose dangerous antics disrupt the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Knife in the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E02, A teenager's waverunner causes accidents and his father threatens to sue Baywatch for not rescuing him ahead of his victims. JD takes out his personal problems on Sean. Zack relentlessly pursues Carrie while she pursues Jason.

programme.title: Bad Boyz
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E03, Sean and Jenna clash when she tries to close Baywatch so investors can develop the property. Carrie is afraid she's not lifeguard material after her reluctance to jump into the water from a hovering helicopter.

programme.title: Dangerous Games
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E04, Leigh goes hang gliding with Sam Parks, a daredevil pilot who puts her life in danger. Things go horribly wrong when Kekoa's cousin, Nani, parties on a boat with drunken frat boys and ends up alone in the ocean.

programme.title: Stone Cold
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E05, A plane carrying a donor's heart crashes, and it’s up to Jason to make a desperate dive to retrieve the heart before the patient dies. Two hooligans steal a car and end up trapped underwater. Jenna tries to get Leigh to turn against Sean.

programme.title: Broken Promises
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E06, To avoid jail, Danny joins Team Baywatch. Leigh doesn't trust him. Kekoa battles her father over her lifeguard career and moves out. JD, Zack, and Jason hustle two gorgeous women who turn out to be con artists who turn the tables on them.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E07, Jenna convinces ruthless Councilman McKenna to close the Training Center. Sean suspends Zack after he severely injures JD during a rescue. Kekoa expresses her deep love for JD – but to Leigh! Zack sees a ghostly woman from his dreams.

programme.title: The Cage
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E08, Sean confronts a "shark tour" operator dangerously dumping chum to lure sharks. A tourist who wants to be a hero to impress his son keeps interfering with Jason's rescues. JD and Kekoa try to keep their passionate relationship a secret.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E09, Sean's incredible guilt after a surfing accident leads to a crisis of faith. Zack has to choose between loyalty to his Baywatch teammates and his competitive ambitions.

programme.title: Ties that Bind
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E10, Zack is devastated when Sean promotes Carrie instead of him. Zack and Jason befriend a man and his teenage daughter who harbor a dangerous secret. Zack supplies a boat to escape to Maui, but disaster strikes before they get there.

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E11, Leigh suspects Sasha, an attractive tourist, of murdering her husband. Betraying Leigh, Jason seduces Sasha with shocking results! Sean is shocked when he discovers the truth about his ex-wife's visit to Hawaii.

programme.title: Ex-Files
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E12, A series of fake rescue calls puts Sean, Jenna and Zack’s lives in danger. Jenna replaces Councilman McKenna, giving her the power to shut down the Training Center! JD tries to get Kekoa’s father to bless their relationship.

programme.title: The Stalker
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E13, Carrie rescues a spearfisherman who starts obsessively stalking her. Sean, Jason, and Zack save her from his deadly pursuit, but can Carrie feel safe saving strangers again? Sean is jealous of Sam dating Leigh, but Leigh has doubts about Sam.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.
